_comment: Azure Static Web Apps configuration for Next.js SPA

routes._comment: Redirect HTTP to HTTPS for all traffic
SPA fallback - all routes serve index.html for client-side routing

globalHeaders._comment: Security and caching headers applied to all responses

_instructions.setup: Place this file in the /Frontend folder (same level as package.json)
_instructions.deployment: Azure will auto-detect this during GitHub Actions deployment
_instructions.customDomain: Configure in Azure Portal → Static Web Apps → Custom domains
_instructions.cors: Backend CORS must allow https://librarysmart.me and https://www.librarysmart.me
